title: Protect your heart during winter with 5 simple daily habits
description: Winter's chill silently strains your heart.  Cold weather constricts blood vessels, raises blood pressure, and thickens blood, increasing cardiac workload. Simple daily practices like staying active, keeping warm, eating well, staying hydrated, and maintaining a consistent sleep schedule can effectively protect your cardiovascular health.

title: Chinese billionaire’s plan: Gaming tycoon fathered 100 children
description: Chinese billionaire Xu Bo reportedly aims to father at least 20 US-born children via surrogacy to inherit his $1.1 billion gaming fortune. While his company denies claims of over 100 children, they confirmed 12 were born in the US. This trend echoes similar desires from figures like Pavel Durov and Elon Musk to expand their legacies.

title: ‘AI agents are becoming a problem’: OpenAI CEO flags risks; offers $555K role
description: OpenAI is hiring a high-paid Head of Preparedness amid growing fears of AI systems exploiting security flaws and harming mental well-being. CEO Sam Altman acknowledged models are finding critical vulnerabilities, while also highlighting AI's potential psychological impact. The role will tackle cybersecurity, biosecurity, and self-improving AI risks, a crucial step as AI's dual nature becomes apparent.

title: Travis Kelce admits he let Andy Reid down amid Chiefs’ tough season
description: Kansas City Chiefs fans experienced an unfamiliar season of losses and missed playoffs in 2025, a stark contrast to years of dominance.  Veteran Travis Kelce expressed deep disappointment, feeling he let down coach Andy Reid, highlighting their strong bond and his unwavering sense of responsibility to the team and his mentor.

title: Happy new year 2026: Top 100 wishes, quotes to share with your loved ones
description: As December concludes, the world anticipates New Year's Eve, a global celebration of fresh starts and renewed hope. The article offers wishes and quotes to share this spirit of healing and opportunity.

title: Quote of the day by Arianna Huffington: We need to accept we won’t…
description: Arianna Huffington, a prominent thought leader, advocates for a redefined understanding of success, health, and leadership. She emphasizes that failure is not the opposite of success but an integral part of the journey, fostering resilience and wisdom. Her insights encourage embracing human limitations and learning from mistakes for comprehensive growth and progress.
